StoryText: I'm home alone and suddenly I hear the pots and pans fall out of the cabinet in the kitchen and then I hear the stove turn on.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Ignore it, my mind must be playing tricks on me.
Go in the kitchen and turn the stove off.
Go in the kitchen and watch

OptionResult.Result: I ignore it and go nowhere near the kitchen. My parents come home later and thank me for making food.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: This is unsettling. I was alone in the house. But I was not alone in the house. My mind was not playing tricks on me. I didn't make any food, yet there was food prepared that my parents ate when they got home and they thanked me for it. Do we have a cooking ghost in the house?!

OptionResult.Result: I turn the stove off and it turns back on. I get so scared, I turn to run but trip and hurt myself.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My parents come home and find I injured myself and ask what happened. I lie and say I slipped and fell. I don't want to actually tell them what happened. They take care of me but I am more concerned with whatever was happening in the kitchen.

OptionResult.Result: I run out of the house and go to the library. My parents come home to find a fire in the kitchen.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My parents are so mad when they come home to find a fire. They blame me! They think I left the stove on and left! I was just getting the heck out of there! I was not about to spend another second alone in our haunted house! That's ghost stuff happening! I just read books in the library until they came home, but they yelled at me and made me pay for the damages.

OptionResult.Result: I watch by the kitchen doorway to see pots and pans moving around on their own and cooking food.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My parents come home and thank me for making food. But I wasn't the one who made the food. It was the strangest thing. There was no one there but I kept seeing flashes of arms and legs moving around. And food being prepared... on its own? I can't even explain, I think there is a ghost in our house... that likes to cook?
